bill_title: to establish the value-added agricultural loan fund, to transfer funds from the revolving economic development and initiative fund, and to continuously appropriate the money in the fund.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish the value-added agricultural loan fund, to transfer funds from the revolving economic development and initiative fund, and to continuously appropriate the money in the fund. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Board of Economic Development shall transfer the sum of six million dollars by October 1, 1997, the sum of six million dollars by October 1, 1998, the sum of six million dollars by October 1, 1999, and the sum of six million dollars by October 1, 2000, from the revolving economic development and initiative fund to the Department of Agriculture to be deposited in the value-added agricultural loan fund. Section 2. All money in the value-added agriculture loan fund is continuously appropriated for the purpose of making loans for projects that add value to agricultural commodities. Money in the value-added agriculture loan fund is available for matching on a one to one basis. Loan repayments, interest, and investment earnings shall be credited to the value-added agriculture loan fund. Section 3. The Value-Added Finance Authority may adopt rules: (1) To make loans from the value-added agriculture loan fund; and (2) Establishing criteria for application, qualification, payment, and repayment of loans from the value-added agriculture loan fund for value added agricultural projects. Section 4. The Value-Added Finance Authority shall prepare an annual report of the value- added agriculture loan fund by October first. The report shall detail the activities of the Value- Added Finance Authority, the terms and conditions of any loans made, and the current status of outstanding loans. Section 5. The secretary of agriculture shall approve vouchers and the state auditor shall draw warrants to pay expenditures from the value-added agriculture loan fund.
